metadata.description: Multi-tentacled orchestration plugin for Claude Code

plugins.name: claude-octopus
plugins.description: v8.4.0 - Fast Opus 4.6 auto-routing (v2.1.36+), context window monitoring statusline, cost-optimized model selection. v2.1.34+ integration, GPT-5.3-Codex, event-driven workflows, Agent Teams, Workflow-as-Code YAML. 29 personas, 32 commands, 43 skills. Run /octo:setup.
